Files Headings

index.js

 
'use strict';

Check if we're required to add a port number.

See
https://url.spec.whatwg.org/#default-port
Params
port Number String Port number we need to check
protocol String Protocol we need to check against.
API
private 
module.exports = function required(port, protocol) {
  protocol = protocol.split(':')[0];
  port = +port;

  if (!port) return false;

  switch (protocol) {
    case 'http':
    case 'ws':
    return port !== 80;

    case 'https':
    case 'wss':
    return port !== 443;

    case 'ftp':
    return port !== 21;

    case 'gopher':
    return port !== 70;

    case 'file':
    return false;
  }

  return port !== 0;
};
